resources.string: Thank you for signing in. The app is now running in the background and you can close it.

AppDetection will collect the following information about your Android phone usage: The timestamp of when you opened which app and your location (in the form of latitude and longitude) when opening it. AppDetection will register if you were connected to WiFi and/or Bluetooth, but no other information about your connection is stored. AppDetection records whether the phone is connected to a set of headphones, whether the phone is charging, and if the auto-brightness settings is on, and the screen brightness sensitivity. 

 You can at any time request to have access to all data we have collected on you, and to have it deleted if you desire so.

You have decided not to accept our terms for the app. That is okay, but if you change your mind you can always click the button below in order to view the conditions again. No data will be collected about you as of now.
